ids_properties.title: Electron Cyclotron Resonance Heating/Current Drive (ECRH/ECCD) System
ids_properties.comment:
Basic Information Description: Electron Cyclotron Resonance Heating/Current Drive (ECRH/ECCD) System
State: Active
Responsible person(s): Handong XU (ext: 63332), Xiaojie WANG(ext: 66514), Jian ZHANG
Group leader: Fukun LIU (ext: 61609)
Location: Horizontal port M
Specifications Frequency: 140GHz
Maximum power: 1MW with a goal of 100s for each Gyrotron system
Adjustable injection angle range of wave beam: Poloidal angle: ±5 °~ ∓25 °, Toroidal angle: ±25°
Data Production Raw data Tree: EAST Nodes: ECRH1 (1-D, output of detector for injected power measurement of No.1 gyrotron, Unit: V) ECRH2 (1-D, output of detector for injected power measurement of No.2 gyrotron, Unit: V) ECRH3 (1-D, output of detector for injected power measurement of No.3 gyrotron, Unit: V) ECRH4 (1-D, output of detector for injected power measurement of No.4 gyrotron, Unit: V) Processed data Tree: Analysis Sub Tree: ECRH_EAST Nodes: PECRH1I (1-D, injected power of No.1 gyrotron, Unit: kW) PECRH2I (1-D, injected power of No.2 gyrotron, Unit: kW) PECRH3I (1-D, injected power of No.3 gyrotron, Unit: kW) PECRH4I (1-D, injected power of No.4 gyrotron, Unit: kW)
mode Identifier for the main plasma wave mode excited by the EC beam. For the ordinary mode (O-mode), mode=1. For the extraordinary mode (X-mode), mode=-1 {constant}
